description: The #2 hire in the Customer Experience department of Weekend Health, and the first shift each day, I take pride in tackling all that Sequence Customer Experience has thrown my way.
jobDuties: Correspond with customers through Zendesk email. Account issues, sign up issues, general questions about the Sequence program and escalations to member Care Coordinators.
Listen and transcribe voicemails left by insurance companies, pharmacies and customers alike to the corresponding customer account for their Care Team to follow up with.
Verify identity and scale photos of incoming sign ups through the Sequence app verification process. Reject and false or fraudulent submissions.

description: Technical writing for Eaze involved researching, creating, publishing, and maintaining informative and instructive articles for both customers and employees.
jobDuties: Knowledge base oversight as an author and content manager. Creating both a customer facing help center as well as internal training guidebooks.

postion: Quality Improvement Specialist | Eaze Technologies, Inc.
description: Quality Improvement at Eaze involved being a Tier 2 Specialist and overseeing much of the day to day of the Tier 1 Customer Service Department.
jobDuties: Quality Improvement by managing and coaching Tier 1 agents work as a Tier 2 specialist.

description: Starting at Eaze as a part time Customer Experience Specialist was my entry role at the company. It is where I learned and mastered the core elements of Customer Experience.
jobDuties: Frontline customer service via emails and chats using Zendesk and proprietary software.
